name: Enigma Code: Prologue
description:
In the world of the future, no one is surprised by advanced artificial intelligence - it is used in almost all spheres of human life. And then a new technological breakthrough led to people having the ability to digitize their minds. Now, researchers can create special, isolated virtual spaces that can give people a lot of opportunities... or not?

You are an artificial intelligence designed to help optimize a virtual world that has almost always been orderly. But the mysterious glitch that has occurred in the most protected part of the virtual world is threatening catastrophic consequences.

Help CEO find the cause of the failure and many errors before the situation deteriorates and causes irreparable harm to everything and everyone inside the virtual space.

"Enigma Code: Prologue" is an experimental game in the genre of "point-and-click", which first of all refreshes the story of the character. That is why the main emphasis in the game is focused on the thoughts and experiences of the main character. Answer questions, find information in files, help find the sources of errors and observe.

Game features:


  • Unusual visual style
  • Mysterious story
  • Short duration (10-15 minutes)
